workshoptitle: Oracle Fusion Applications can be extended to add WebCenter Content based managed attachments

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides detailed guide to extend Oracle Fusion Applications with WebCenter Content based managed attachments

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: Prepare tenancy for setting up WCC Marketplace instance, including VCN and Database

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup WebCenter Content Marketplace Instance
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Configure WebCenter Content for FA Integration
tutorials.description: How to configure WebCenter Content for FA Integration

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Create a sandbox and add WebCenter Content Grant Webservice in Fusion Apps
tutorials.description: How to create a sandbox and add WebCenter Content Grant Webservice in Fusion Apps

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Extend Business Object To Get Managed Attachments Page And Embed In Module
tutorials.description: Extend Business Object To Get Managed Attachments Page And Embed In Module

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Verify Changes In Sandbox, Publish And Use The Integration
tutorials.description: Verify Changes In Sandbox, Publish And Use The Integration

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
